name: Serious Salads: Carrot Slaw with Cranberries and Toasted Walnuts
description: With dried cranberries, toasted walnuts and a bright-tasting citrus vinaigrette, this carrot slaw is delightfully crunchy and sweet. It's perfect for a light lunch or as a healthy side to sandwiches or burgers.
recipeIngredient: 3 tablespoons walnut oil or extra virgin olive oil
1 teaspoon lemon zest, from one lemon
2 tablespoons lemon juice, from one lemon
2 tablespoons freshly squeezed orange juice, from one orange
3 scallions, white and green parts, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Toss all ingredients together in a large bowl. Cover and refrigerate for at least 15 minutes to allow flavors to blend. Season to taste with salt, pepper and honey. Serve cold.
